data.comment: The match is underway in Nashville.

Nashville drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.

Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.

Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ezequiel Barco.
Great play from Franco Escobar to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Nashville's Randall Leal gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
